function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Risk of disease propagation in disaster-affected areas","Spread of contagious diseases in urban environments","Reliance on 5g technology for contact tracing may lead to privacy and security risks for individuals' data","Use of unmanned aerial vehicles uav and robots for surveillance and enforcement of lockdown policies may lead to privacy concerns and violations","Shortage of medical resources due to pandemic and logistics challenges","Transmission of infectious diseases through contact-based tasks","Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to remote interaction and reduced spatial barriers","Transmission of unstructured data from terminal sensors to the cloud platform in real-time","Inadequate architectural design leading to infection propagation","Climate change contributes to the global spread and redistribution of communicable infections","Inadequate indoor environmental quality iaq in built environments can raise human exposure to viral infections such as sars-cov-2"]}
